column4: EU data supervisor probes EU bodies' software deals with Microsoft
column5: BRUSSELS EU data protection authorities are investigating whether the European Commission and other EU institutions comply with the bloc's strict data privacy rules in their software deals with Microsoft.

column4: UPDATE 2-EU data supervisor probes EU bodies' software deals with Microsoft
column5: BRUSSELS  April 8 EU data protection authorities are investigating whether the European Commission and other EU institutions comply with the bloc's strict data privacy rules in their software deals with Microsoft.

column4: European data supervisor investigates Microsoft contracts with EU bodies
column5: BRUSSELS  April 8 The European Union's data protection supervisor on Monday said it had launched an investigation into whether services and products provided by the software giant Microsoft to EU institutions comply with its new data protection rules.

column4: SEC steps on Tesla 'reasonable' to prevent problems: commissioner
column5: WASHINGTON The U.S. securities watchdog's request that a federal judge hold Tesla Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk in contempt over the billionaire entrepreneur's use of Twitter was "reasonable " said a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission official on Monday.

column4: SEC steps on Tesla 'reasonable' to prevent problems -commissioner
column5: WASHINGTON  April 8 The U.S. securities watchdog's request that a federal judge hold Tesla Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk in contempt over the billionaire entrepreneur's use of Twitter was "reasonable " said a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission official on Monday.
